data.name: Sissy.top Pink Theme
data.description: This adds a pink theme to Sissy.top.

data.name: Google Colab Font in Windows
data.description: CoLab seems to be using some fonts that are not installed on Windows 10 by default. I simply change them to the fonts that I preferred and are already installed. The CCS is simple, feel free to change.

data.name: Slack Teams
data.description:
A set of CSS to make Microsoft Teams a little more like Slack, for those of us being force marched into the painful migration from the eye-friendly and space efficient Slack to the backlog-heavy vast emptiness of Teams

This version is based HEAVILY on the existing work mstmstyle did for his "Condensed Microsoft Teams for Light theme", in fact I flat out copied, pasted, and modified it.

mstmstyle says this is fine :)
This style was created to make up for the issue complained about here: https://microsoftteams.uservoice.com/forums/555103-public/suggestions/17408641-please-create-a-professional-compact-chat-layout

Please visit that link, vote it up, and hope MS fixes Teams :)

data.name: Wallhaven: Display infos on thumbs
data.description: Forces display of the small information bar that appears when hovering a thumbnail.

data.name: Keepa Dark
data.description: Version oscura de Keepa (Porque lo negro siempre es mejor)

Does not cover every area of application, mainly the feed.

A dark theme for realpython.com

data.name: 好好登录
data.description:
站在KPI的对立面，和强制扫码登录斗争到底。  
优先显示账号密码登录，顺便也显示下二维码。  
目前就做了QQ、淘宝，有什么想增加的站点可以留言。

data.name: redcafe.net by BamaBraves
Codeable - App Dark Mode
data.description: I created dark mode for the Codeable app. Most of the pages are styled and each individual element has been manually styled to work perfect in dark mode.

data.name: 9gag Dark - Improved - Horizontal menu - CLEAN
data.description:
A Theme for 9gag to make it dark and overall a very nice experience.
Added a few little Details and improvements.
Has the Horizontal Menu
This is still a work in progress - so if you find any issues or have troubles with the theme please let me know.
